page.title: 20CREDITS
page.content:
{Co-ordinating staff of the {Huddersfield area Domesday Project.
Mr.S.Clements {Mount Pleasant Juniors Miss.H.Oakley {Crosland Moor Juniors Mr.G.Wilkinson {Spring Grove Juniors Mr.D.Milner {Paddock Juniors Mr.J.R.Knight {Moor End High School { {______________________________________ {Computer Editorial Team: Arvinder Dhesi, Craig Frost, Richard Filippi and J.R. Knight, based at Moor End High School. {______________________________________ Many thanks also, to all pupils and teachers concerned, for their invaluable work and effort, with the addition of the staff & pupils of {Lowerhouses Junior School.
